Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: スージー
Entry.EnglishText: Susie

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: 王の盾兵
Entry.EnglishText: Royal Shield Knight

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: 副官
Entry.EnglishText: Lieutenant

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたがスージーね？
Entry.EnglishText: You are Susie, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、女王様。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, Your Majesty.

Entry.JapaneseText: 楽になさい。 そして、こちらへ……
Entry.EnglishText: Be at ease. Now then, come here...

Entry.JapaneseText: は、はい……
Entry.EnglishText: A-All right...

Entry.JapaneseText: 綺麗な顔……
Entry.EnglishText: What a lovely face...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……い、いえ、そんな…… 女王様ほどでは……ないです……
Entry.EnglishText: Eh...? N-no, I'm not... Compared to Your Majesty, I'm nothing...

Entry.JapaneseText: だ、だって……女王様ほど 美しいガジュマの女性を 見た事ないですから……
Entry.EnglishText: B-besides... I have never even seen a Gajuma woman as beautiful as you are...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしより美しい ヒューマの女性なら、 見た事があるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder, have you seen any Huma women who surpass me in beauty?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……女王様が一番…… お美しいです……
Entry.EnglishText: No! ...You are the most beautiful...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……本当に、本当にそう思う？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Do you really, truly feel that way?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……本当です。 とても……とても美しいです…… その、美しさだけじゃなく、 気品もあって……とても素敵です……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I do. You are very, very beautiful... And not just your beauty, but your elegance is remarkable as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう、スージー…… こんなわたくしを美しいと 言ってくれて……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you, Susie, for calling one such as myself, "beautiful"...

Entry.JapaneseText: じょ、女王様……？
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Your Majesty...?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなに気に入ってくれたなら あなたに……差し上げるわ……
Entry.EnglishText: If you are so taken with it, then I shall bestow it upon you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 同時に私は意識を失ったみたい…… 気がつくと、遠くから声が聞こえて……
Entry.EnglishText: At that time, I must have lost consciousness. When I started to come to, I heard voices, as if from far away...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……姫様!! 姫様、大丈夫ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Princess! Oh Princess, are you unhurt?

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ……なぜ受け入れられないの？ 早く、早くしないと……
Entry.EnglishText: Why... Why will it not accept me? Quickly, we must get this done soon, or...

Entry.JapaneseText: 姫様、きっと見つかります、 ですから、それまでの辛抱です。 きっと間もなく現実のものに……
Entry.EnglishText: My Princess, we will certainly find one suitable in time, so please have patience until then. Surely, it shall come to be...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ……あなたには 迷惑ばかりかけてしまって…… ごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva... I do nothing but cause you worry. I am sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をおっしゃいますか、姫様。 それがこのジルバの使命…… 姫様は何も気にする事はありません。
Entry.EnglishText: What are you saying, My Princess? My very purpose is to serve you. There is nothing you need be troubled by.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ……
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva...

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、参りましょう、姫様。 あとの事は私めにお任せください。
Entry.EnglishText: Now, shall we go, My Princess? Please leave the rest to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: よく来てくれましたね。 あなたの名前は……？
Entry.EnglishText: Here you are at last. What might your name be?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアです。 スールズの生まれです。
Entry.EnglishText: My name is Claire. I'm from the town of Sulz.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……あなたの顔、 そしてその手足…… 美しいわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... That face of yours, those hands, those legs... They are exquisite.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……えっ？ あっ……お誉めくださって ありがとうございます、女王様。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Huh? Um... You honor me with your praise, Your Majesty.

Entry.JapaneseText: その美しさがあれば、 どんな相手でもあなたの事を 好いてくれるのでしょうね……
Entry.EnglishText: With beauty such as yours, anyone would surely fall for you before long...
What...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたほどの美しささえあれば…… 美しい顔……なめらかな肌……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, with beauty such as yours... That lovely face... that smooth skin...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あ、あの……見た目って そんなに大切なものなんでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: U-Um, well... Are appearances really that important?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんですって？
Entry.EnglishText: What did you say?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……すみません…… でも、私……人が人を好きになるのに、 見た目はそんなに大きな事じゃないと 思うんです。
Entry.EnglishText: Ah... pardon me! It's just that, when it comes to liking someone, I don't think outward appearance plays a very large role.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……昔、私の両親が初めて 出会ったのは、真っ暗な洞窟に 迷い込んだ時だったそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: ...A long time ago, my parents met for the first time while lost inside of a pitch black cave.

Entry.JapaneseText: 暗闇の中、二人は励まし合いながら、 あきらめずに出口を探し続けました。
Entry.EnglishText: While lost in the darkness, they were able to stay strong and search for a way out thanks to the support they gave each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: 翌朝、無事に洞窟から出られた時、 初めてお互いの顔を見て、 二人は大笑いしたそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: The next morning, after they had safely exited the cave, they saw each others' faces for the first time and burst into laughter.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why?

Entry.JapaneseText: か弱くて可憐な娘だと思っていた相手は 泥だらけ、髪もボサボサの村娘。 たくましく頼もしい男性だと思っていた 相手は無精ひげだらけのやせた男。
Entry.EnglishText: The delicate belle that my father had envisioned was a mud-caked village girl with tangled hair; and the gallant, dashing man that my mother had in her mind was a spindly fellow in dire need of a shave.

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人は、自分たちの想像との 違いに大笑いして、洞窟の中なら 王子様とお姫様でいられたのにねって 顔を見合わせたそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: They were laughing at how their expectations didn't match reality. Inside the cave, they had thought of each other as something like a prince and princess.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、二人は、洞窟を出る前から お互いの事を好きになっていたと 言ってました。
Entry.EnglishText: But you know, they told me that they had already began to fall for each other before they had even left the cave.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、私は思うんです。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>は姿ではなく、 心を好きになるものだって。
Entry.EnglishText: So that's what I believe. People don't fall in love with appearances, they fall in love with someone's heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もし、洞窟を出た時に、 どちらかがガジュマだったとしたら、 それでも、あなたのご両親は 同じ事を言ったかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: What if when they had exited the cave, one of them was revealed to have been a Gajuma. Do you think that your parents would have told you the same story?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……言ったと思います。 好きになってしまったら、 ガジュマとかヒューマとか 考える事自体、無意味だと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I believe so, yes. Once you fall for someone, whether they're Gajuma or Huma doesn't matter anymore.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無意味？ 本気で言ってるの……？
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't matter? Is that how you truly feel...?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes.

Entry.JapaneseText: 嘘よ……本当の事を言いなさい…… ガジュマの身体は醜い…… ヒューマはみんな そう思っているんでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: You lie... Tell me what you really think! "Gajuma are hideous." That is what all Huma believe, is it not?
Your Majesty...?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしには <Cyan>暗闇<White>は無かった……！
Entry.EnglishText: There has never been such darkness for me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 常に行動には監視が付き、 自由に外に出る事も出来ず、 思いどおりに人と会う事もできない……
Entry.EnglishText: I am monitored at all times, I cannot leave the palace freely, and I cannot even meet with people as I please.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もしかして女王様……
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty, could it be that you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……黙りなさい!!
Entry.EnglishText: Be silent!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは、わたくしが 一番欲しいものを 持っているのよ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You possess the one thing that I desire more than anything!

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ……さま……
Entry.EnglishText: Queen...Agarte...

Entry.JapaneseText: 姫様…… ご気分はいかがですか？
Entry.EnglishText: My Princess, are you feeling all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: とてもいい気分だった…… 今までとは全然違ったわ…… この子が……クレアがわたくしを 救ってくれるんだわ……
Entry.EnglishText: It was a wonderful sensation... Completely different from anything I have experienced before. This girl... Claire, is going to be my salvation...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう少しの辛抱でございます。 儀式の日が来れば、姫様の力は……
Entry.EnglishText: Please be patient for just a while longer. You will need to conserve your strength for the day of the ceremony...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね……儀式が終われば、 すべては終わるのね……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... Once the ritual is finished, all of this will come to an end.

Entry.JapaneseText: いいえ、終わりではありません。 儀式を経て、姫様も、わが国も 生まれ変わるのです。 いわば、大いなる始まりなのです。
Entry.EnglishText: No, not an end. After the ritual, My Lady as well as the entire kingdom are going to be reborn. It will be, so to speak, a grand beginning!

Entry.JapaneseText: 生まれ変わったら…… あの人はわたくしを見てくださるかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Once I am reborn... I wonder if he will look my way?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしはあの人と同じ世界を 生きる事ができるのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if I will be able to live in the same world as him...

Entry.JapaneseText: 案ずる事はありません。 姫様が生まれ変われば、 お二人を隔てていた壁は 跡形もなく消えるのですから。
Entry.EnglishText: There is no need to be anxious about such a thing. Once you are reborn, my princess, all barriers separating the two of you will disappear, leaving behind no trace they were ever there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何者!?
Entry.EnglishText: Who's there!?

Entry.JapaneseText: しまった……！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh crap...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……誰か！ 誰か……！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Guards! Come now, guards!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Veigue>...
Entry.Notes: it was originally "..." for some reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陛下におかれては お変わりもなく、 お喜び申し上げます。
Entry.EnglishText: I am delighted to see that you are in good health, Your Majesty.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>…… あなたは人を殺め、一度は城を追われた身。 陛下に直訴するなど、なんと恐れ多い……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>... You were banished from this castle on account of murder. For you to make a direct request of Her Majesty is simply disgraceful.

Entry.JapaneseText: それは承知のうえです……
Entry.EnglishText: That is not lost on me.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちは……！
Entry.EnglishText: We need to...!

Entry.JapaneseText: わかっている。 だから、俺に任せてくれ。 ……頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: I know. Just leave this to me, please.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>…… あなたはわたくしの真意を 聞かせてほしいと言いましたね？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>... I believe you spoke of wanting to know my true intentions?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、単刀直入に申し上げます。 陛下はヒューマの娘を集め、 何をなされるおつもりなのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. If you will allow me to get straight to the point... What are you planning to do with the Huma girls you have captured?
Your Majesty...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……こんな言い伝えがあります。
Entry.EnglishText: ...There exists a legend that goes as such...

Entry.JapaneseText: 「古の戦に、<Blue>聖なる王<White>は朽ちて、 暗黒の月をこの地に放ちたり。 されど、かの月に赤き光の満ちし時、 王は再び姿を現さん」
Entry.EnglishText: "In the ancient war, the <Blue>Sacred King's<White> life ended in vain, and a Dark Moon was unleashed upon the Earth. Yet, when the moon is enveloped by crimson light, the King shall be revealed once more."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>聖なる王<White>……月の光？ このお守りと何か関係が……？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Sacred King<White>...and the light of the moon? Are those connected to my charm somehow...?

Entry.JapaneseText: その昔…… 不思議な力を持つ<Blue>聖なる王<White>と、 王と同じ力を持つ六人の聖者たちが この世界を治めていました。
Entry.EnglishText: Long ago, the <Blue>Sacred King<White> and his six Saints, who all possessed a mysterious power, reigned over this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: ある時、王と六人の聖者たちは 理想の違いから対立し、やがて それは、世界を巻き込んでの 大いなる戦いへと発展しました。
Entry.EnglishText: Due to their differing ideals, the King and the Saints eventually came into conflict and strayed down a path that enveloped the entire world into a tremendous war.

Entry.JapaneseText: どちらも国の行く末を案じ、 理想の社会を作ろうとしての対立。 そこには善も悪もありませんでした。
Entry.EnglishText: Both were concerned for the future of nations, and fought to establish an ideal society. In that there was no good or evil.

Entry.JapaneseText: 果てしなく続いた戦いの末、 六人の聖者は<Blue>聖なる王<White>を倒し、 この地に封印したのです。
Entry.EnglishText: After a war that had seemed endless, the Six Saints defeated the <Blue>Sacred King<White> and sealed him within the earth.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしはその封印を解き、 <Blue>聖なる王<White>をよみがえらせる 儀式を執り行うのです。
Entry.EnglishText: I am going to perform a ritual to release the seal and raise the <Blue>Sacred King<White> from his grave.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今こそ、その力がこの国にも、 わたくしにも必要なのです。
Entry.EnglishText: Now more than ever, the kingdom, as well as myself, are in need of his power.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が父、先王ラドラスが 引き起こした能力者の同時覚醒、 バイラスの大量発生による混乱…… 我が国は滅びの道を進みつつあります。
Entry.EnglishText: The awakening of Force users caused by my late father, King Ladras, and the chaos caused by the mass outbreaks of Biruses... Our kingdom is continuing toward a path of destruction.

Entry.JapaneseText: 滅びの道!? そんなヤバイ事が 起こるっていうのかよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: A path of destruction?! Is something that awful really going to happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ですから、そうなる前に 手を打たなくてはなりません。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Therefore, I must take action before it is too late.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>聖なる王<White>の力が復活したとして、 その力をどう操るというのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Supposing you do bring about this <Blue>Sacred King<White>'s power, how do you plan to control it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>で。
Entry.EnglishText: With my <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王家に連なる者だけが持ち得る<Yellow>月の フォルス<White>に、<Blue>聖なる王<White>の力を合わせれば、 必ず、カレギアを救う事ができる。
Entry.EnglishText: If I combine the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>, which is passed on only through the royal family, with the power of the <Blue>Sacred King<White>, surely Callegea can be saved.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしは、そう信じています。
Entry.EnglishText: I have faith in this.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「暗黒の月」というのが、 陛下のフォルスの事なのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Does the "Dark Moon" refer to Your Majesty's Force?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これ以上は、王家以外の者が 知る必要はありません。
オレが聞きたいのはそんな話じゃない！ あんたが命じてさらわせた ヒューマの娘たちはどこだ!? クレアは今、どこにいる!?
Entry.EnglishText: What I want to know has nothing to do with that! Where are the girls you ordered to be kidnapped?! Where is Claire?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……その事ですか…… ……クレア……そう…… あなたは彼女のお友達なのですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Ah... So that is why you are here. Claire...yes... You must be a friend of hers.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ。クレアだ。 儀式とクレアにどんな関係がある？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, Claire! What does she have to do with this ritual?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……光……光のない世界なら 良かったのに。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Light. If only there were no light in this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: この世界は……明るすぎるのです。 暗闇など、どこにもありません。
Entry.EnglishText: This world is too radiant. There is no darkness to be found.

Entry.JapaneseText: このまぶしい光の中で生きるために、 彼女はなくてはならないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: In order to live within this dazzling light, that girl is essential.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは…… わたくしの希望。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire is... my hope.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何を言っているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: 安心なさい。儀式が終われば、 すぐに彼女はお返しします。
Entry.EnglishText: Be at ease. Upon completion of the ritual, I shall return her to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があろうとも、彼女は決して 変わる事はありません。 彼女は目を閉じる事ができるから。
Entry.EnglishText: Regardless of what takes place, she is not going to change. Because she can close her eyes.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どういう意味だ!? クレアに何をするつもりだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: What is that supposed to mean?! What are you planning to do to her?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下？ アガーテ様!?
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty? Queen Agarte?!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか様子が おかしくないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it me, or is she acting strange?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……あれは…… わたくしのもの……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... belongs to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: なにコレ!?
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐああぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: わあああぁーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Waaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Whaaaa!!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Iyaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: くッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ち、力が出ねえ……ッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I feel...weak...

Entry.JapaneseText: ア……アガーテ!!
Entry.EnglishText: A-Agarte!

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh!

Entry.JapaneseText: 姫様、大丈夫ですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: My Princess, are you all right?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 取り押さえよ!! 王の間を血で汚すな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Subdue them! Do not defile the throne room with their blood!

Entry.JapaneseText: はっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yes ma'am!

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Here they come!

Entry.JapaneseText: この無礼者どもめが!!
Entry.EnglishText: Such insolence!

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王!! クレアはどこだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte! Where is Claire?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪あがきを……！ ええい、捕えよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Your resistance is futile! Now, seize them!

Entry.JapaneseText: なにっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: What...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐああぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: わあああーーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Waaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Whaaaa!!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃああああッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Iyaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: くッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: この無礼者どもめが!!
Entry.EnglishText: Such insolence!

Entry.JapaneseText: 離せ……離せっ……
Entry.EnglishText: Let go of me...! Let me...go...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん、 心配をおかけしました。
Entry.EnglishText: My apologies for having worried everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、姫様……！ よくぞご無事で……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, dear Princess! Thank goodness you're safe!

Entry.JapaneseText: 長旅の疲れもございましょう、 しばらくは、ご養生なさいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: You must be tired after such a long journey. It would be best for you to recuperate for the time being.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、この状況下で 休むわけには……
Entry.EnglishText: I do not feel as though I should be resting, given the current circumstances...

Entry.JapaneseText: なりません。
Entry.EnglishText: I insist.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、無理をなされて、 姫様のお体に万が一の事があれば、 本当に国が傾いてしまいます。
Entry.EnglishText: The state of the Kingdom will only deteriorate further if anything were to happen to your health. There is no need for you to overexert yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: さぁ、お部屋へ参りましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: Now, I shall lead you to your room.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの、私……
Entry.EnglishText: But, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: 姫様……さぁ早く……
Entry.EnglishText: Come now, Princess. We must hurry.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こっているんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Has something happened?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ラジルダが壊滅した。 わかっているのはそれだけだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Catastrophe has befallen Razilda. That is all I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 君は何も心配する事はない。 女王として、ここにいればいい。
Entry.EnglishText: You need not to be concerned. You just need to stay here and play the part of Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウストさんは？
Entry.EnglishText: And what will you do?

Entry.JapaneseText: 出動命令が出た。 私はこれから獣王山へ 向かわなくてはならない。
Entry.EnglishText: I have been given orders to advance towards Mount Sovereign.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……獣王山にある王家ゆかりの聖所に、 <Veigue>たちが向かっているらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently, Veigue's entourage are heading towards the Royal Family's sanctuary within the mountain.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は彼らを止めなくてはならない。 場合によっては……
Entry.EnglishText: I must stop them. And if it comes down to it, I may even...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、 この国を救うために戦ってます！ あなたと戦う理由なんて……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and his friends are fighting for the sake of the Kingdom! You have no reason to oppose them!

Entry.JapaneseText: この国を守るのは我々だ。 得体の知れぬ者が、その秩序を 乱すとなればなおさら。
Entry.EnglishText: The duty to protect this nation falls on us alone. We must remain ever more vigilant in the event that suspicious individuals attempt to disrupt this order.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: 将軍。 出発の準備が整いました。
Entry.EnglishText: General, we are ready to depart.

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐに行く。
Entry.EnglishText: I will be there shortly.

Entry.JapaneseText: それでは、<Red>陛下<White> 行ってまいります。
Entry.EnglishText: Well then, <Red>Your Majesty<White>, I shall take my leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… 私にも何かできる事はないの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... Is there really nothing I can do to help?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『玉座』 国王のみが座る事を許される 聖なる腰かけ。代が変わるごとに 新しいものが作り直される。 古いものは城内で保管されている。 将来的には、王立博物館に特別展示 コーナーが作られる予定。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Royal Throne - A sacred seat that only the monarch is allowed to sit upon. A new one is created upon the ascension of the next ruler. The old ones are kept within the castle. In the future, the Royal Museum will feature them in a special exhibition.
